parameter.name: accessKey
parameter.label: Access Key
parameter.description: The Access Key to get access. You need to register to get a key.

parameter.name: secretKey
parameter.label: Secret Key
parameter.description: The Secret Key to get access. You need to register to get a key.

parameter.name: serviceRegion
parameter.label: Service Region
parameter.description: The Service Region is need to select which region is closest to you.

parameter.name: audioFormat
parameter.label: Optional User specified audio format
parameter.description: The user can override the system default audio format with their prefered option. "MP3"" and "OGG" are the only audio formats that are supported.

parameter.name: cacheExpiration
parameter.label: Cache expiration life
parameter.description: Optional value, determines the age in days that cache files will be purged. If not specified, default value of 30 days used. if set to 0 functionality disabled.
